title: Is the Shadowfire Kindred skin supposed to be unavailable?
body: Not sure where to put this, but I just started playing on the PBE and it says this skin is unavailable, even though I've seen people playing with it on stream (BoxBox) Not sure if this is a bug or not so I thought I would post here first before I report anything :)

replies.body:
You might want to post this PBE bug here instead:

- http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/

I checked the PBE and I was able to buy Kindred, the skin (separately), and use it in a Custom Game. I did notice, however, that Kindred's champion display page did show Shadowfire kindred as "Unavailable." It's possible that the bug is limited to a display issue. In any case, the PBE Team may have more context on the matter.

Thanks for the reply, just checked and it was displayed on the Skin page in the store, which it wasn't before. Very unusual, no idea what could have caused this. And I should have guessed there was a PBE specific board, guess I just wasn't thinking. Hopefully this is just a one time issue on my side and nothing else :P
